alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:11PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN COLBERT AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CST... At 511 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tishomingo State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40-50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Pleasant Site, Malone, Pogo, Mynot, Mt Hester, Margerum, Srygley Church, Allsboro, and Maud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
